item.title: Use Gogh to color your terminal!
item.description: As mentioned in a previous note, I now use Atom together with Gnome Terminal for most of my coding and writing time and really enjoy my current setup. As I use two different applications, I have similar but slightly different color schemes, which, weirdly enough, has been bugging me for a while… That is why, a few days ago, I started to edit the color but looking a the them repository of the Atom theme I liked (e.
